name: humbled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
humble
to make someone understand that they are not as important or special as they thought: He was humbled by the child's generosity. The world champion was humbled (= unexpectedly defeated) by an unknown outsider in last night's race. Compare
humiliate
